<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Archer's Aim](/Feats.aspx?ID=6255) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=561" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 185 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Archer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=238)

**Prerequisites**
[Archer Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6252)

</column>

---

You slow down, focus, and take a careful shot. Make a ranged Strike with a weapon in the [bow](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=3) or [crossbow](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=17) weapon group. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the attack roll and ignore the target's [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=62) condition. If the target is [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=79), reduce the flat check from being hidden from 11 to 5.
name: Archer's Aim
